text: This word doc loads fine for me using https://mvnrepository.com/artifact/org.apache.tika/tika-parsers/1.15
creator: fanningpj@yahoo.com

text: What version of Tika and POI are you using that resulted in the reported exception?
creator: onealj@apache.org

text: I was using 1.14 which throwed exception. with 1.15, it works fine.
creator: gaurav.chd3@gmail.com
fanningpj@yahoo.com
text: I was able to reproduce the issue with tika 1.14 (which depends on poi 3.15) - tika 1.15 depends on poi 3.16 so looks like the fix is in poi 3.16.
Resolving as WORKSFORME since a fix was already applied between 3.15 and POI 3.16.
creator: onealj@apache.org
